name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HobbyRC+ - Hide Out of Stock Items

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HobbyRC.co.uk - Adds a checkbox menu item to hide out of stock items.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Visit HobbyRC UK and you will find a new checkbox which hides out of stock items when checked.
A number shows how many items are hidden.
Simply uncheck to restore hidden items.

This also adds a "Filter Search..." text box which if you type into and hit enter will allow you to hide items not relevant to the entered text.

When you click the logo of the extension it also has a shortcut to the HobbyRC UK website at the top.

This is an experimental plugin, things may break in future.
HobbyRC are not not associated with this extension.
This extension is client side in the browser, it does not modify the source.
